extension_description.message: Sync Tab Groups sind eine einfache Möglichkeit, Ihre aktuellen Tabs nach Themen zu organisieren. Jede geöffnete Gruppe wird mit einem Fenster synchronisiert, so dass alle Änderungen an den Registerkarten gespeichert werden. Somit können Sie einen aktuellen Tabs-Flow schließen, während Sie einen anderen Tabs-Flow öffnen.

synchronized_window.description: Label for synchronizing window in popup

open_window_group.description: Hover help for open in new window button

show_tabs.description: Hover help for show tabs in group button

hide_tabs.description: Hover help for hide tabs in group button

undo_closing.description: Hover help for undo closing button

force_closing.description: Hover help for force closing button

open_tab.description: Hover help for open tab button

close_tab.message: Tab entfernen und schließen wenn geöffnet
close_tab.description: Hover help for open tab button

move_tab_group.description: Name of the menu in the context (right click on tab)

new_window.message: Ein neues Fenster erzeugt automatisch eine neue Gruppe.

new_private_window.message: Ein neues privates Fenster erzeugt automatisch eine neue Gruppe.

close_private_window.message: Gruppe in einem privaten Fenster entfernen, wenn das Fenster geschlossen wird.

sync_pinned_tabs.message: Angeheftete Tabs zu Gruppen hinzufügen (Wenn inaktiv, werden diese beim Wechsel einer Gruppe nicht geschlossen)

bookmark_help_folder.message: Lesezeichen werden standardmäßig in "Weitere Lesezeichen"/SyncTabGroups gespeichert.

bookmark_help_moving.message: Um das Stammverzeichnis zu ändern, einfach den SyncTabGroups Ordner innerhalb der Lesezeichen verschieben.

bookmark_help_session.message: Der Sessionname ist das Unterverzeichnis der Lesezeichen auf diesem Computer.

import_export_help_added.message: Gruppen werden als geschlossene Gruppen importiert

import_export_help_support.message: Import unterstützt Sync Tab Gruppen und Tab Groups JSON Dateien.

privileged_url_help_reason.message: Sync Tab Groups kann privilegierte URLs aus Sicherheitsgründen nicht direkt öffnen:

open_url_help_method_part_2.message: Füge die URL in die Adressleiste ein

privileged_url_help_warning.message: Warnung: Diese Adressen werden von Firefox automatisch geschlossen, wenn die Erweiterung aktualisiert oder deaktiviert wird.

command_description_create_group_swtich.message: Eine neue Gruppe erzeugen und dorthin wechseln.

command_description_focus_next_group.message: Fenster bei öffnen der nächsten Gruppe aktivieren.

command_description_focus_previous_group.message: Fenster bei öffnen der vorherigen Gruppe aktivieren.

command_description_remove_group_swtich.message: Aktuelle Gruppe im Fenster schließen, entfernen und zur nächsten Gruppe wechseln.

show_title_window.message: Name der Gruppe in allen Fenstern als Präfix des Titels anzeigen

bookmarks_weak_help.message: Automatisches Speichern von Lesezeichen kann Probleme verursachen. Bis zur Problembehebung würde ich nicht empfehlen dieses zu verwenden.

options_about_start.message: TODO Welcome to Sync Tab Groups! I highly recommend you to start checking the different options. You will make Sync Tab Groups fit your expectation. Also, you will understand how to use the extension well, as each option is explained.

options_about_further.message: For further information, check the guide (link in the navigation bar) on the Sync Tab Groups Website.

options_about_enjoy.message: I hope you are loving your experience with Sync Tab Groups. If so, don't hesitate to add a nice review on the extension download page for sharing it.
options_about_enjoy.description: TODO Message in the about section of the Preferences

options_about_contribute.message: Beyond to use it, you can contribute. Like finding bugs, suggesting great new features to add or simply translating it in your language. For any reasons, don't hesitate to contact me.
options_about_contribute.description: TODO Message in the about section of the Preferences

options_about_dev.message: Sync Tab Groups is an extension I am developing in my free time. I am doing everything to provide you the best extension. For those who came across bugs, I apologize for the disagreement.
options_about_dev.description: TODO Message in the about section of the Preferences

options_behaviors_help_invisible.message: New windows opened without Sync Tab Groups are Invisible.

options_behaviors_help_visible_new.message: New windows opened without Sync Tab Groups are Visible as a new unnamed group.

options_behaviors_help_change_visibility.message: Any window can be specifically changed from/to visible/invisible from the Menu. (button at the bottom left)

options_behaviors_pinned_excluded.description: TODO Pinned Tabs are not part of a group.

options_behaviors_pinned_excluded_notpar.message: Pinned tabs are not part of any groups.

options_behaviors_pinned_excluded_switch.message: Switching/closing actions don't impact the pinned tabs.

options_behaviors_pinned_excluded_usecas.message: Use case: Global Tabs (Mail tab, Music tab...)

options_behaviors_pinned_included.description: TODO Pinned are saved in the group

options_behaviors_pinned_included_part.message: Pinned tabs are part of the group in the window.

options_behaviors_pinned_included_switch.message: Switching/closing actions close and save the pinned tabs in the group.

options_behaviors_pinned_included_usecas.message: Use case: Important tabs for the group.

options_behaviors_tabsopening_discarded.description: TODO Tabs are not fully loaded on opening

options_behaviors_tabsopening_discarded_.message: Tabs are not fully loaded on opening.
The tabs are only loaded once you active (click/focus) them. After, they stay loaded.

options_behaviors_tabsopening_full_loade.message: Tabs are completely loaded on opening.

options_behaviors_tabsopening_full_heavi.message: Consume more memory and network data.

options_behaviors_tabsopening_limits.description: TODO Limits for tabs opening behavior

options_behaviors_tabsopening_limits_tem.message: Temporary data (forms...) added before tabs were closed are lost. (Limited by the browser)

options_behaviors_tabsopening_limits_his.message: Tabs History are not restored. (Limited by the browser)

options_behaviors_private.description: TODO Behavior of the Private windows

options_behaviors_private_visible.message: New private windows opened without Sync Tab Groups are visible as a new private groups.

options_behaviors_private_groups.message: Groups opened in private windows are private as well.

options_behaviors_private_notsaved.message: Private groups are not saved on the disk

options_behaviors_private_autoremoved.message: A private group closed is automatically deleted.

options_behaviors_private_restart.message: A restart of the browser will closed and deleted all the private groups.

options_behaviors_private_invisible.description: TODO Behavior of the Private windows

options_behaviors_private_invisible_crea.message: New private windows opened without Sync Tab Groups are Invisible.

options_behaviors_private_changestate.message: Any private window can be specifically changed from/to private/invisible from the Menu.

options_groups_backup_behavior_download.message: Automatic download of a file with all your groups. (except private ones)

options_groups_backup_behavior_invisible.message: The download is invisible in the download history.

options_groups_backup_behavior_distinctf.message: Each specific timer is saved in a distinct file.

options_groups_backup_behavior_overwritt.message: However, the same timer will overwrite its previous back up.

options_groups_backup_location_subfolder.message: Done in the subfolder '$FOLDER$' in your browser download folder.

options_groups_backup_location_restictio.message: The browser restricts it to be inside the browser download folder, so you can't change the location.

options_groups_backup_timer_start.message: Timers start when the extension is launched or the back up is enabled, and back up when the time indicated is over.

options_groups_backup_timer_done.message: The save is done when the time indicated is over.

options_groups_backup_timer_reset.message: Timers reset to 0, when you restart the browser, disable the back up option or disable the extension.

options_groups_backup_manual_button.message: From the shortcuts menu (Right click on the extension icon

options_groups_backup_manual_file.message: Saved in a distinct file, called manual, overwritten as well.

options_groups_cleaning_removeall_warnin.message: Once done, you can't recover your groups!
